page.title: 04HEALTH SURVEY
page.content:
We did a survey to see how many people in our area are associated with health. We found that there are the following:- 9 CHEMISTS 1 CHIROPODIST 4 DENTISTS 1 DENTURE REPAIRER 4 DOCTORS 1 HEALTH CENTRE 1 HEALTH CLUB 1 OPTICIAN 1 PRIVATE HOSPITAL
Our area is served by 2 National Health Service hospitals, Southend General hospital and Rochford hospital, both of which are just outside our area. In our private hospital a room of your own costs Â£129 per night We then did a survey {CONTINUED.....
